name: Backtracking
description:
In this game, you are a hero trying to rescue the princess. You have cornered the bad guy, and will be able to get home soon without trouble...

Well, will you ? Will you be able to face your acts, walking over enemy corpses to get home ? Your choices matter, as each one of them will impact your Karma.
Feel free to play again to discover each of the 3 endings !

Created during Global Game Jam 2015 arround the theme "What do we do now ?"

https://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/backtracking

Credits:
